original_text: And Adonijah and all the guests that were with him heard it as they had made an end of eating. And when Joab heard the sound of the trumpet, he said, Wherefore is this noise of the city being in an uproar?
korean_text: 아도니야와 그와 함께 한 손님들이 먹기를 마칠 때에 다 들은지라 요압이 뿔나팔 소리를 듣고 이르되 어찌하여 성읍 중에서 소리가 요란하냐

sentences.original_text: And Adonijah and all the guests
that were with him heard it
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 자들이 그것을 들었으니

sentences.original_text: as they had made an end of eating
And when Joab heard the sound of the trumpet
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요압이 나팔 소리를 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: of the city being in an uproar
